definitions.definition: A monocotyledonous plant ( Allium cepa ), allied to garlic , used as vegetable and spice.
The bulb of such a plant.
examples: My eyes are stinging from the chopped onions .

definitions.definition: Any of various plants, mostly of the genus Allium , that are more or less similar to Allium cepa .
examples: Many onions are delicious; domesticated onions such as Allium cepa and Allium fistulosum are especially good, but even wild onions such as Allium canadense and Allium validum are nice in small doses.

definitions.definition: Alternative letter-case form of Onion ( “ an inhabitant of Bermuda; a Bermudian ” ) .
Soy , particularly when used in compound words related to the soy boy stereotype .

main_definition: A monocotyledonous plant ( Allium cepa ), allied to garlic , used as vegetable and spice.
secondary_definitions: The bulb of such a plant.
Any of various plants, mostly of the genus Allium , that are more or less similar to Allium cepa .
( slang , of a drug ) An ounce .
Alternative letter-case form of Onion ( “ an inhabitant of Bermuda; a Bermudian ” ) .
( 4chan slang , slang ) Soy , particularly when used in compound words related to the soy boy stereotype .
